name: BSD x64 Command Shell, Bind TCP Inline
author: Balazs Bucsay @xoreipeip <balazs.bucsay[-at-]rycon[-dot-]hu>
description: Listen for a connection and spawn a command shell

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: PrependSetresuid
options.description: Prepend a stub that executes the setresuid(0, 0, 0) system call

options.name: PrependSetreuid
options.description: Prepend a stub that executes the setreuid(0, 0) system call

options.name: PrependSetuid
options.description: Prepend a stub that executes the setuid(0) system call

options.name: PrependSetresgid
options.description: Prepend a stub that executes the setresgid(0, 0, 0) system call

options.name: PrependSetregid
options.description: Prepend a stub that executes the setregid(0, 0) system call

options.name: PrependSetgid
options.description: Prepend a stub that executes the setgid(0) system call

options.name: AppendExit
options.description: Append a stub that executes the exit(0) system call

options.name: CreateSession
options.description: Create a new session for every successful login

options.name: InitialAutoRunScript
options.description: An initial script to run on session creation (before AutoRunScript)

options.name: AutoRunScript
options.description: A script to run automatically on session creation.

options.name: CommandShellCleanupCommand
options.description: A command to run before the session is closed
